predicate.note: Frames file for 'terminate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison with 'end' and 'fire'.

roleset.name: end, stop
roleset.note: End point might be TMP or LOC

example.name: transitive
example.text: Comprehensive Care, which *trace* terminated its agreement to merge with First Hospital, dropped 7/8 to 3 7/8.
example.arg: its agreement to merge with First Hospital

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: The insurance concern said all conversion rights on the stock will terminate on Nov. 30.
example.arg: all conversion rights on the stock

roleset.name: cause to cease employment

example.name: poor John
example.text: BigHugeCo terminated John from his position as deputy garbage collector yesterday.
example.arg: his position as deputy garbage collector

roleset.note: Actually that sounds a little odd with the Arg2
